about_the_game:
This is a plot-oriented interactive puzzle game. The gameplay uses mouse clicks or drag-and-drop methods to promote the development of the plot.

The game tells the story of an ordinary young man's love in life. The protagonist is an introverted young man who has been single for more than 20 years and has a beautiful longing for love. By chance, he met that he liked the goddess. After getting encouragement from his friends in the game, he decided to confess to the goddess, and since then he worked hard and studied hard.Finally succeeded in catching up with his goddess.

The game contains r18 animated plot of two characters.All character animations can be unlocked by playing the game normally.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains some pornography, 
all characters are over 18 years old

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Sound Device
